channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and Crusher face off in an off-road showdown. The trucks must speed through the snow, swim through the sea, and soar to a finish line in the sky.

channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia take on their parents at Tailball.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy & Tia find a lost toy and vow to return it to its owner.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Kai is super excited to ride the Nebulator, but Tim isn't so sure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Gabby's Dollhouse
channel.desc: When Gabby, Pandy and the Gabby Cats prepare for a sleepover in the Garden, they discover Pillow Cat has never been to a sleepover.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA
channel.desc: Dora and Boots help fix their friend's running shoes in 'Run Cynthia Run', then in 'Dora In Space', Dora and Boots rescue Tico from space after his spaceship falls apart.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Ben is in training for the elf games, Holly wants to join in but the rules state there is absolutely no flying or magic allowed. Ben gives Holly a chance to join in without using magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Queen Thistle reads Ben and Holly a book about a nasty witch, so Nanny takes the children to meet a real one who lives in the forest. Nanny is rude to the witch, who freezes her with magic.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: While Mummy and Daddy Pig attend a refresher antenatal class, Peppa and George join Miss Rabbit's Sibling School, and learn about what to expect when the baby arrives.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Daddy's car goes missing it's up to Detective Potato to find it.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa, Suzy Sheep, Mummy and Daddy help George understand what a potty is and how to avoid accidents. George gains confidence.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa receives an invite to Candy Cat's birthday party - on a double decker bus.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: The new club house has a little counter, ideal for playing shop. But what will the children's new club house shop sell.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Auntie, Uncle Pig and cousin Chloe are coming for dinner and Peppa is allowed to join too! Peppa is very proud of staying up late - she even stayed up later than the Daddies.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Madame Gazelle teaches the playgroup to play the recorder. After lots of practice at home, they put on a concert for their parents.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Peppa and George go birdwatching with Grandpa Pig. Grandpa really wants to see a cuckoo, then he hears one calling.

channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy, Tia and Grandma go on the search for treasure.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: It's the Roar festival, and Tim wants to have the best Roar in town.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Tim Rex in Space
channel.desc: Tim, Tommy and Tia find a lost mammoth in their house.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: The Smurfs
channel.desc: Gargamel meets his nephews Dwayne and Rowena in 'Family Time', then in 'Smurf vs Machine', Handy is jealous of DD.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Two robots take on more than they can handle in 'Pups Save Their Digi Tal Friends', then in 'Pups Save the Rainbow', Mayor Humdinger finds a prism that drains Adventure Bay of colour.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: PAW Patrol
channel.desc: Chickaletta has super powers in 'Pups Save a Giant Chicken', then in 'Pups Stop Harold's Deep Freeze', Harold Humdinger puts Adventure Bay in a deep freeze so that he can become mayor.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Rubble & Crew
channel.desc: The pups dig tunnels for new books in 'The Crew Builds Library Treasure Tunnels', then in 'The Crew Builds a Super Snack Dispenser', Mix, Charger, and Wheeler surprise Rubble.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines
channel.desc: Blaze and Crusher must beat Video Game Land's four epic levels to return home.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: When Peppa's bike gets a flat tyre and needs fixing, Peppa and her friends have fun riding their imaginary bikes and jumping in pretend muddy puddles.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It's Richard Rabbit's birthday party and George is invited, and that can only mean one thing; Soft Play.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: Mummy Sheep gets the news that she has got a new job far away, leaving Suzy and Peppa to wonder how they're going to carry on being best friends.

channel.title: Peppa Pig
channel.desc: It is Talent Day at Peppa's playgroup, and Madame Gazelle wants everyone to show the class their special talent.

channel.name: Nick Jr UK

channel.desc: Daddy Pig is left behind when everyone takes Grampy Rabbit's little boat to the riverside picnic spot. Will someone remember him and save him some cake.

channel.title: PAW Patrol

channel.name: Nick Jr UK
channel.title: DORA

channel.title: Ben & Holly's Little Kingdom
channel.desc: Holly shrinks Lucy and her dog, Rex, down so they can play in the Little Kingdom.

channel.desc: King Thistle wants bread for his royal breakfast, but there isn't any flour in the castle. Mr Elf takes everyone to the Elf Windmill to find out why it takes so long to make flour.
